nodes.name: Grow Cabin
nodes.description: CEA home grow system for mushrooms + spring greens using recipes + logging.

nodes.name: CEA
nodes.description: Controlled-Environment Agriculture: make the environment controllable and repeatable.

nodes.name: Recipes
nodes.description: Stages + setpoint bands + schedules + safety limits; versioned and tied to logs.

nodes.name: Logging
nodes.description: Time series + actuator states + user events; enables repeatability and support.

nodes.name: Mushrooms
nodes.description: Humidity + FAE balance; contamination management; stage-based fruiting.

nodes.name: Spring greens
nodes.description: Light + irrigation + airflow; avoid mold/damping-off; consistent harvest timing.

nodes.name: Humidity
nodes.description: Primary control variable for mushrooms; also relevant for germination.

nodes.name: Fresh air exchange
nodes.description: Controls CO₂ and morphology; too much dries, too little elongates stems.

nodes.name: CO₂
nodes.description: Optional sensor initially; important for mushroom fruiting quality.

nodes.name: Light
nodes.description: Key lever for greens growth rate/quality; schedule + intensity.

nodes.name: Watering
nodes.description: Greens watering strategy; must manage damping-off risk.

nodes.name: Sensors
nodes.description: Temp/RH, door, light (greens), optional CO₂, water level.

nodes.name: Actuators
nodes.description: Fan (FAE), humidifier, lights, pump/valves (greens).

nodes.name: Contamination
nodes.description: Mushroom risk; cleanability + workflow + filters matter.

nodes.name: Condensation
nodes.description: High RH can cause wet surfaces and mold if airflow/temps poorly managed.

nodes.name: Home growers
nodes.description: Primary target: wants simplicity, reliability, and clear recipes.

nodes.name: MVP
nodes.description: Start with robust control + logging; avoid overengineering.

nodes.name: Prototype 0
nodes.description: Logging + manual control to learn dynamics and failure modes.

nodes.name: Investor route
nodes.description: Flow + artifacts to reach first investor (lane choice, proof package, outreach loop).

nodes.name: Segmentation
nodes.description: Choose initial customer segment before building too much product.

nodes.name: Chefs/Foodies
nodes.description: Segment A: taste/plating; easiest early validation.

nodes.name: Wellness/Functional
nodes.description: Segment B: cognition/longevity; premium pricing.

nodes.name: DIY/Home kits
nodes.description: Segment C: “I grew this”; gifting + storytelling.

nodes.name: Families/Education
nodes.description: Segment D: activity + learning; slower but sticky.

nodes.name: Marketing
nodes.description: Segmentation, positioning, channels, website, conversion, partnerships.

nodes.name: Stakeholders
nodes.description: Investors, customers, suppliers and what we need from each.

nodes.name: Investors
nodes.description: Investor lane, pack, deck storyboard, and outreach loop.

nodes.name: Startup setup (UK)
nodes.description: Company formation, banking, accounting, insurance, compliance, name checks.

nodes.name: Costs
nodes.description: Cost models (mock range + James BOM), CSV exports, pricing assumptions.

nodes.name: Product & Process Dev
nodes.description: How we build (cadence/experiments/KPIs) and what we build (MVP scope).

nodes.name: Briefings
nodes.description: Reusable briefs (family brief, investor one-pager outline, etc.).

nodes.name: Org structure
nodes.description: Roles and operating model (Nicki/Andrew/James/Harry/Chloe).

nodes.name: Companies House
nodes.description: UK company incorporation (Ltd), directors, shareholders, registered office.

nodes.name: UKIPO trademark
nodes.description: Trademark checks for “Grow Cabin” and brand protection.

nodes.name: Business banking
nodes.description: Business current account, card controls, integrations.

nodes.name: Accounting/Bookkeeping
nodes.description: Xero/QuickBooks/FreeAgent, receipts, VAT/PAYE basics.

nodes.name: Insurance
nodes.description: Public/product liability, employers’ liability, etc.

nodes.name: Compliance
nodes.description: Electrical safety/UKCA/EMC, consumer rights, documentation.

nodes.name: Partners
nodes.description: Suppliers/kit partners for mushrooms + microgreens; reference kits; co-branded bundles.
